scenarios.news_headline: Senate passes bipartisan infrastructure bill with 69-30 vote
scenarios.news_summary: The U.S. Senate passed a $1.2 trillion infrastructure bill with bipartisan support, sending it to the House where Speaker promises swift action.
scenarios.market_question: Will the Infrastructure Bill be signed into law by end of Q4?

scenarios.news_headline: Presidential approval rating drops to 38% in latest poll
scenarios.news_summary: Major polling firm reports presidential approval at 38%, down 5 points from last month. Economic concerns cited as primary driver.
scenarios.market_question: Will President's approval rating be above 45% on January 1st?

scenarios.news_headline: SEC approves first spot Bitcoin ETF applications
scenarios.news_summary: Securities and Exchange Commission has granted approval to multiple spot Bitcoin ETF applications, marking a historic regulatory milestone.
scenarios.market_question: Will Bitcoin exceed $100,000 by end of January 2026?

scenarios.news_headline: Major exchange announces temporary withdrawal halt
scenarios.news_summary: Leading cryptocurrency exchange suspends withdrawals citing 'scheduled maintenance' amid reports of unusual wallet activity.
scenarios.market_question: Will the exchange resume normal operations within 48 hours?

scenarios.news_headline: Star quarterback ruled out for remainder of season with ACL injury
scenarios.news_summary: Team's franchise quarterback confirmed out for season after MRI reveals torn ACL. Backup quarterback will start in playoff games.
scenarios.market_question: Will the team win the Super Bowl this season?

scenarios.news_headline: Tennis star wins semifinal in straight sets at Australian Open
scenarios.news_summary: World number 2 dominates semifinal match 6-2, 6-3, 6-4, advancing to final against defending champion.
scenarios.market_question: Will the world number 2 win the Australian Open?

scenarios.news_headline: Apple announces next iPhone launch event scheduled for September
scenarios.news_summary: Apple sends media invitations for September 12th event with tagline 'It's Glowtime', strongly hinting at iPhone 17 announcement.
scenarios.market_question: Will Apple announce iPhone 17 in September?

scenarios.news_headline: Nvidia reports Q3 earnings miss, guidance below expectations
scenarios.news_summary: Nvidia reports revenue of $28B vs $30B expected. CEO cites 'demand normalization' and provides cautious Q4 outlook.
scenarios.market_question: Will Nvidia stock close above $140 by end of month?

scenarios.news_headline: Fed signals potential rate cut at December meeting
scenarios.news_summary: Federal Reserve Chair indicates 'meaningful progress' on inflation, suggesting rate cut likely at upcoming FOMC meeting.
scenarios.market_question: Will the Fed cut rates at December FOMC meeting?

scenarios.news_headline: Unemployment rate rises to 4.2% in latest jobs report
scenarios.news_summary: Bureau of Labor Statistics reports unemployment increased to 4.2%, with job gains slowing across most sectors.
scenarios.market_question: Will unemployment exceed 4.5% by end of Q1 2026?

scenarios.news_headline: Peace talks between warring nations show 'significant progress'
scenarios.news_summary: Mediators report breakthrough in negotiations, with ceasefire agreement expected within days according to diplomatic sources.
scenarios.market_question: Will ceasefire be announced before end of January?

scenarios.news_headline: Trade negotiations stall as tariff threats escalate
scenarios.news_summary: Major trading partners fail to reach agreement, with new tariffs set to take effect next week. Markets react negatively.
scenarios.market_question: Will new tariffs be implemented as scheduled?
